args.name: x1
args.desc: The x position of the first end of the line.

args.name: y1
args.desc: The y position of the first end of the line.

args.name: x2
args.desc: The x position of the second end of the line.

args.name: y2
args.desc: The y position of the second end of the line.
Any other lines to draw at the same time.

args.name: color
args.desc: The color of the line(s) (0-15), defaults to the active color.
